meanings.definition: To bid before an auction begins.
meanings.sent1: I always prebidding on items I want to buy online.
meanings.sent2: She decided to prebidding on the rare painting to secure it.
meanings.sent3: The eager bidder couldn't resist prebidding on the antique vase.
meanings.sent4: His strategy of prebidding early often caught others off guard.
meanings.sent5: Prebidding allows you to set your maximum price before the auction starts.

meanings.definition: The act of placing a bid before an auction starts.
meanings.sent1: Participating in prebidding can give you an advantage in the auction.
meanings.sent2: The prebidding for the artwork reached a surprisingly high amount.
meanings.sent3: The prebidding war between collectors made the auction exciting.
meanings.sent4: Her success in prebidding showed her keen interest in the item.
meanings.sent5: The prebidding process helped determine the starting price of the auction.
